img_text: ANDRENOCHROME AN IMMORTALITY SERUM OBTAINED FROM THE ADRENAL GLAND O F LIVING CHILDREN AFTER THEY HAVE BEEN TERRORISED TO GET THE HIGHEST LEVELS OF ADRENALINE. IT HAS LSD LIKE QUALITIES AND IS USED IN SATANIC RITUALS BY MONARCHIES POLITICIANS, CONGRESSMEN, ELEBRITIES, CEO S AN THE ELITE KIDS ARE THEIR DRUG
